name: OUT OF SPACE (itch) (Pojemnik)
description:
OUT OF SPACE is a shoot'em up browser game .

Features:

  • Pixel art graphics
  • High difficulty level
  • 12 levels including powerful boss at the end

This game is an improved version of an old project made in c++ a few years ago.  The main goal was to learn unity, but the game turned out to be quite good, so I decided to share it.

The project is still being developed.
